duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide project planning and management for energy efficiency and/or demand response programs.
Recruit, manage, and provide installation support for field technicians.
Deliver program financial and performance status reports.
Assist sales and engineering team in development of energy audits, M&V plans, and cost estimating.
Interface with local contractor teams to provide timely and accurate results to utility customers.
Make recommendations for improved customer support and contract retention strategies.
Monitor and update performance tracking reports and project deviations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business, accounting, economics, energy management, or engineering.
Professional Certification: AEE (Association of Energy Engineers) - CMVP, CEM, or CEA
